mapper.select: select i.id, i.name, c.author, c.content, c.time, s.name as specifications_name, s.id as specifications_id, s.unit_price, (select unit_price from mall_specifications where info_id = #{infoId} order by unit_price limit 1) as minimum_unit_price from mall_info as i left join mall_comments as c on i.id = c.info_id left join mall_specifications as s on i.id = s.info_id where i.id = #{infoId}

select cart.commodity_id, info.name as comm_name, spec.unit_price, spec.name, spec.id, cart.total from mall_shopping_cart as cart left join mall_info as info on cart.commodity_id = info.id left join mall_specifications as spec on cart.specifications_id = spec.id where cart.user_id = #{id}
